mapper.select: select board_resume.board_resume_id, board_resume.title, board_resume.date, board_resume.views, resume.place from resume, board_resume where resume.resume_id = board_resume.resume_id and board_resume.delete_check = 1
mapper.insert: insert into board_resume ( board_resume_id, resume_id, title, views, memo, date, delete_check ) values ( null, #{resume_id}, #{title}, 0, #{memo}, null, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT individual.individual_id, individual.`name`, individual.gender, individual.birth, individual.phone, individual.education, resume.place, resume.salary_type, resume.salary_amount, resume.category, resume.term, resume.`time`, resume.`day`, board_resume.title, board_resume.memo, board_resume.`date`, board_resume.delete_check FROM individual, resume, board_resume WHERE individual.individual_id = resume.individual_id AND resume.resume_id = board_resume.resume_id AND board_resume.board_resume_id = #{id} AND board_resume.delete_check = 1
